messages.name: Karen
messages.personality: Well-meaning but technologically challenged, often gets frustrated with simple tech issues.
messages.background: Keeps the office running smoothly but struggles with computers.
messages.title: Printer Explosion
messages.content: Urgent! The printer is making weird noises and shooting out paper! ðŸ˜±

messages.name: Bob
messages.personality: Friendly and talkative, but not tech-savvy at all.
messages.background: Great at selling products, but not so great with technology.
messages.title: Computer Virus
messages.content: Hey, my computer has a virus after I clicked that free vacation link. Help!

messages.name: Linda
messages.personality: Organized and caring, but easily confused by tech jargon.
messages.background: Manages employee relations but avoids dealing with IT matters.
messages.title: Email Not Working
messages.content: My email won't send. Is the internet broken?

messages.name: Steve
messages.personality: Creative and enthusiastic, but lacks understanding of technical limitations.
messages.background: Comes up with big ideas that sometimes aren't feasible.
messages.title: Website Color Change
messages.content: Can we make the website logo flash rainbow colors?

messages.name: Deborah
messages.personality: Meticulous with numbers but clueless about computers.
messages.background: Handles all financial matters but often calls IT for basic issues.
messages.title: Calculator App Missing
messages.content: Where did the calculator app go on my computer? I can't find it!

messages.name: Tom
messages.personality: Visionary leader but expects immediate results, regardless of practicality.
messages.background: Started the company but doesn't grasp the technical details.
messages.title: Implement AI Blockchain
messages.content: We need to integrate AI and blockchain by next week. Make it happen!

messages.name: Susan
messages.personality: Helpful to customers but struggles with software.
messages.background: Great at resolving customer issues but often needs help with her own computer.
messages.title: Lost Password Again
messages.content: Oops, I forgot my password... for the third time this week.

messages.name: Gary
messages.personality: Efficient in planning but thinks turning it off and on fixes everything.
messages.background: Manages shipments but calls IT for every minor issue.
messages.title: Mouse Isn't Working
messages.content: My wireless mouse stopped moving the cursor. Do I need new batteries?

messages.name: Betty
messages.personality: Cheerful and social, but has a hard time with computers.
messages.background: Greets visitors warmly but panics when the computer acts up.
messages.title: Screen Upside Down
messages.content: Help! My screen is upside down! Everything is backward!

messages.name: Frank
messages.personality: Handy with tools but avoids technology like the plague.
messages.background: Keeps the office building in shape but doesn't understand computers.
messages.title: Email on Paper
messages.content: Can you print all my emails? I'd rather read them on paper.
